Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUIView.controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUIView.controllers.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GUIController
public class GameController extends Object implements GUIController
GameController class handles the main Game scene

    • createPane

      private javafx.scene.layout.StackPane createPane(ArrayList<ColorS> students, ArrayList<ColorT> towers, boolean mn, int noEntry)
      Creates an Island Pane collecting all Island information
      Parameters:
      students - the list of Students on the Island
      towers - the list of Towers on the Island
      mn - true if MN is on the Island
      noEntry - the number of NoEntry tiles on the Island
      Returns:
      the Pane containing all Island information

      students - ArrayList containing all Students on the Island
      counters - ArrayList containing all counters needed to show information
